name: The T.I.Y. Game (featuring the Experts at Life)
name_original: The T.I.Y. Game (featuring the Experts at Life)
description:
In Trivia it Yourself (featuring the Experts at LIFE), main protagonist Sandra plays trivia games in order to collect all six stones on her floor. Will she get the fantastic prize of a fancy TV, or is she falling for some greater evil at play? Answer correctly and find out!

Game by: Dylan Ateba

Music By: DeerTears
